content.raw:
Rhetorical question, largely to myself: should we be silently fixing nan's? It's good to know when things are broken. A console message would be useful if it doesn't impact performance and doesn't flood the screen when something bad happens.

Alternatively, what about asserts? In release mode we silently fix, in debug mode we catch the error.
